title: (x) "901" giant address number of Eames Office - hand drawn {Stephen}
content:
Just watched a short film on Charles and Ray Eames' Venice design studio, and noticed some great type specimens. Anyone have any idea what this one is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083500/http:/typophile.com/files/photo.jpg) | 79.78 KB |
| [photo1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083500/http:/typophile.com/files/photo1.jpg) | 86.37 KB |
author: moggy

comments.content: I think this might be Helvetica Compressed/Inserat.
The geometrically strict lines on the '901' make me feel it was done by hand specifically for that size. It was their giant address number, after all.
